snippet: An elective course at the Ethical Culture Fieldston School seeks to combine history, English, ethics, languages and science while exploring different areas of the city.
abstract: Elective course at the Ethical Culture Fieldston School in the Riverdale section of the Bronx focuses on the evolution of public housing, from tenements to towers, in New York City.
lead_paragraph: An elective course at the Ethical Culture Fieldston School seeks to combine history, English, ethics, languages and science while exploring different areas of the city.

headline.seo: In Fieldston School Course, All of New York’s a Classroom
headline.main: For Bronx Private School, All the City’s a Classroom in an Experiential Course
headline.print_headline: For Bronx Private School, All the City’s a Classroom In an Experiential Course
